column7: Students will work in depth within each professor's choreographic process, learning creative tools for generating dance material, directing performance, crafting choreographic ideas over a full semester and developing performance skills. This is an elective course that may be repeated to a maximum of 4 hours. May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 4 credit hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance or consent of instructor.
column9: May be repeated in separate terms to a maximum of 4 credit hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance or consent of instructor.
